transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Haan, sir, Amit bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achcha, ji, ji, ji, sir, bataiye.
Customer: Complaint karne ke liye call kiya tha.
Executive: Ji, aapka call aaya tha, sir, ka aaya hoga manager ko.
Customer: Haan, aaya tha.
Executive: Ji, ji, aap actually mujhe Karamveer ji bata dijiye services kyu band karna chahte hain aap ji?
Customer: Jab mai iska plan liya na.
Executive: Achcha, IndiaMART ka.
Customer: To us samay humko jis ke madhyam se baat hua tha jo plan ke bare mein samjhaya.
Executive: Achcha, achcha.
Customer: Wo humko actually bolna tha ke aapko buyer bhi milega aur supplier bhi milega.
Executive: Achcha, matlab aapke paas jo hai kuch maal nahi tha bechne ke liye, kuch product nahi thi bechne ke liye?
Customer: Jo IndiaMART ki team aapke paas aayi jo us samay unhone ye bola ki aapko jo hai saman bhi IndiaMART dila ke dega, seller bhi dila ke dega, buyer bhi dila ke dega.
Customer: Haan, wo alag cheez hai sir, wo nahi chahiye.
Executive: Karamveer ji, apne IndiaMART pe aap kis base pe aaye the? Matlab ki ek platform pe aadmi jabhi aata hai na Karamveer ji ki uske paas saman ho.
Customer: Aapne ye cheez batai thi usko apne jo hai.
Customer: Bataya tha, iske bare me bataya tha, mai koi dealer bhi nahi hu, na kuch nahi.
Executive: Aapke paas koi aisa bulb nahi bechne, light ka aapke paas punji nahi hai, to fir mai kaise karunga bolke bola.
Customer: Us samay humko bola gaya ki aap uska tension mat lo, aap bas isko subscribe plan jo hai uska payment karo, baki mai sab dekh lunga.
Executive: Haan, Karamveer ji, waise to mere se aapki bahut samay se baat ho rahi hai ki aapko jo hai IndiaMART ki jo team hai unhone bataya tha ki aapko seller buyer dono cheez milegi IndiaMART pe. But sir, mai aapko ek cheez bata du, IndiaMART sirf ek seller ko ek buyer ko connect karwata hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar aapke paas products honge to aapko seller buyer se connect karwa payega, agar aapke paas products nahi hai, agar team ne aapko bola.
Customer: Nahi hai, product nahi hai isiliye mai isko achcha, achcha, matlab usko discontinue karna chah rahe hain. Is time Karamveer ji, 31 product aapne dalwa rakhe hai, ye aapne khud se dalwaye hai ya apne team se keh kar dalwaye the?
Customer: Team, team bol bola hai humko call karke.
Executive: Achcha, achcha.
Customer: Kis kis company ka brand ka naam jo hai add kar diya jaye bolke to hum brand name bata diye.
Executive: Karamveer ji, aisa to hoga nahi ki aapko agar aapko kuch jankari nahi hogi to 31 products aap add karoge nahi isme. 31 products to aapne generate karoge na ki aapko jankari hogi ya aapke paas me kuch honge.
Customer: Jankari hai, kshetra me hum log ke area me bikta hai bol kar ke humko jankari hai. Isiliye hum bata diye uske product ke naam.
Customer: Kuch apne se dal diye.
Executive: Karamveer ji, aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye, aadmi services kab leta hai? Kab cheez aadmi ko jab jarurat padti hai ki haan mere paas products pade hue hai, mujhe unhe bechna hai. Pehle aadmi planning karta hai ki haan mere paas products pade hue hai, mai unhe bech du. Aaj aap ye bol rahe ho ki mujhe jo team aayi thi unhone ye bola tha, jo aapke paas sales person aaya tha unhone ye bola tha aapko ki seller aapko seller aur buyer dono cheez la ke dega, product bhi la ke dega aur use bikwayega bhi IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, is cheez ki aapko jankari agar mai aapko de du to maine aapko bata diya na IndiaMART ka jo kaam hai aapko aapke buyer se connect karwana hai. Uske baad aap kya deal close karte ho, kya baat karte ho usko IndiaMART se koi matlab nahi hai. Ji sir. Ab filhal ka jo hai aapka services chal raha hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, bataiye.
Customer: Abhi, abhi baat karne ke baad jaise do char din se.
Executive: Achcha, achcha.
Customer: Manager wagera log call kiye the, naam to nahi malum hai. To ye log bataye tab ja ke humko malum chala ke keval aur keval buyer deta hai.
Executive: Karamveer ji, mere sath bhi aapki do char baar baat ho chuki hai is bare me, aapne mujhe bata diya hai ye cheeze pehle bhi. Aur maine aapko is cheez ke bare me pehle bhi jankari de di thi ki IndiaMART ka jo mainly work hai wo is cheez ka hai ki aapko buyer se connect karwana. Ab mujhe ye bataiye Karamveer ji, hamare paas kitne product available hai filhal apne us pe?
Customer: Apne paas?
Executive: Haan ji. Nahi, abhi kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Kuch nahi available, zero. Koi chance bhi nahi hai abhi aage business karne ka koi?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Kyunki aapne jo yaha pe GST wo dal rakhi hai photos, aapne cement-viment ki aur uski sadiyo ki photos laga rakhi hai.
Customer: Haan, hum kya lagayenge wo khud call karke apna add kar diya hai kidhar kidhar se.
Executive: Achcha, achcha.
Executive: Karamveer ji, ek kaam ek kaam karta hu mai aapka final decision yahi hai?
Customer: Haan, final decision hai, bas band karwa dijiye. Kyunki aapke paas koi product nahi hai bechne ke liye IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Ji. Chaliye mai sir apna head team se concern karta hu, apne manager sir se concern karta hu, mai aapko call back karta hu abhi.
Customer: Abhi call aaya tha ki aaj hi close karna hai nahi to fir.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji, mai abhi ek bar aapko aap se bhi thodi der me aapko call karta hu mai ek bar baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue IndiaMART services.

- Was promised buyer and supplier by IndiaMART.

- IndiaMART team added product photos without consent.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified IndiaMART connects buyers/sellers.

- Executive will consult with head team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after consulting team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- discontinue, services, products, buyer, seller
